org.mpisws.sddrservice

Interface IEncountersService


  • public interface IEncountersService
    Created by tslilyai on 12/21/17.

    The IEncountersService provides the interface (implemented by singleton class EncountersService) to the Encounters library for forming and communication between encounters.

    To use the API, call EncountersService.getInstance() to get the (single) object of class EncountersService. All interface functions can be invoked on the object.

    • Method Detail

      • startEncounterService

        void startEncounterService(android.content.Context context)
        Starts up the encounter-formation service that begins encounter formation and turns on all encounter-based functionality (e.g., sending messages across encounters). If the service is already running, this has no effect.
        Parameters:
        context - the application calling the library

      • addLinkableID

        void addLinkableID(java.lang.String linkID)
        Adds a linkable identifier linkID to the Bluetooth broadcast used to form encounters. This allows a recipient with whom you form an encounter, and who also has access to linkID, to either later or at the present recognize that you were broadcasting linkID.

        Example usages include recognition of group membership (e.g., a linkID that corresponds to "interested in birdwatching") or revealing identity (linking two otherwise anonymous encounters)

        Parameters:
        linkID - the linkable identifier to be added to the Bluetooth broadcast

      • getEncounters

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEncounters(IEncountersService.Filter filter)
        Retrieves all encounters that satisfy the constraints of the filter.
        Parameters:
        filter - a filter consisting of a time frame, required linkable identifier matches, and location; if this is null, all encounters are retrieved
        Returns:
        a list of String, each of which corresponds to the name of an encounter

      • registerGoogleUser

        void registerGoogleUser(java.lang.String googletoken)
        Register a google token to use to sign in the user.
        Parameters:
        googletoken - the authentication token retrieved from the Google OAuth service

      • isSignedIn

        boolean isSignedIn()
        Determines if the user is signed in; if false, the user must be registered with Google again
        Returns:
        a boolean representing whether the user is signed in or not

      • signIn

        void signIn()
        Uses the registered user's details to create an account (if not created) or sign into their Encounters account

      • signOut

        void signOut()
        Logs the user out and erases their user information. Requires re-registering and signing in.

      • deleteAccount

        void deleteAccount()
        Deletes the currently-logged-in user's account and the user's content.

      • sendMsg

        void sendMsg(java.lang.String encounterID,
             java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a message to the specified encounter.
        Parameters:
        encounterID - the String name for the encounter
        msg - a string that represents the message to be sent to this encounter

      • getMsgsFromBeginning

        void getMsgsFromBeginning(java.lang.String encounterID,
                          long thresholdMessageAge,
                          org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESTopics.GetMessagesCallback getMessagesCallback)
        Gets the newest messages of this encounter thread, and invokes the GetMessagesCallback parameter on the retrieved list.
        Parameters:
        encounterID - the String name for the encounter
        thresholdMessageAge - a timestamp (ms) representing the oldest message to be retrieved
        getMessagesCallback - a callback to be called with the list of retrieved messages

      • getMsgsFromCursor

        void getMsgsFromCursor(java.lang.String encounterID,
                       long thresholdMessageAge,
                       org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESTopics.GetMessagesCallback getMessagesCallback,
                       java.lang.String cursor)
        Gets the messages of this encounter from a given point in the encounter thread, and invokes the GetMessagesCallback parameter on the retrieved list.
        Parameters:
        encounterID - the String name for the encounter
        thresholdMessageAge - a timestamp (ms) representing the oldest message to be retrieved
        getMessagesCallback - a callback to be called with the list of retrieved messages
        cursor - the point in the thread at which to start retrieving messages; each message is associated with a cursor (see the getCursor() method for a Msg)

      • reportMsg

        void reportMsg(org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESTopics.Msg msg,
               com.microsoft.embeddedsocial.autorest.models.Reason reason)
        Report a particular message for its content.
        Parameters:
        msg - the message being reported
        reason - the reason for reporting

      • getNotificationsFromBeginning

        void getNotificationsFromBeginning(org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESNotifs.GetNotificationsCallback getNotificationsCallback,
                                   IEncountersService.GetNotificationsRequestFlag flag)
        Gets a page of notifications in the notifications feed from the newest notification, and invokes the GetNotificationsCallback parameter on the retrieved list.
        Parameters:
        getNotificationsCallback - a callback to be called with the page of retrieved notifications
        flag - Indicates the type of notifications to be fetched

      • getNotificationsWithCursor

        void getNotificationsWithCursor(org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESNotifs.GetNotificationsCallback getNotificationsCallback,
                                IEncountersService.GetNotificationsRequestFlag flag,
                                java.lang.String cursor)
        Gets a page of notifications in the notifications feed from the given cursor, and invokes the GetNotificationsCallback parameter on the retrieved list.
        Parameters:
        getNotificationsCallback - a callback to be called with the page of retrieved notifications
        flag - indicates the type of notifications to be fetched
        cursor - a string corresponding to the first notification from where notifications should be retrieved

      • getMessagesFromNotifications

        void getMessagesFromNotifications(java.util.List<org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESNotifs.Notif> notifs,
                                  org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESTopics.GetMessagesCallback getMessagesCallback)
        Gets the messages associated with each notification in the provided list. All messages that exist in the encounter topic associated with the notification, and occurred at or after the time of the notification, are retrieved. The callback is invoked on the retrieved list of messages for each notification.
        Parameters:
        notifs - the notifications for which their corresponding encounters will be retrieved
        getMessagesCallback - a callback to be called with the messages for the notification

      • markAllPreviousNotificationsAsRead

        void markAllPreviousNotificationsAsRead(org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESNotifs.Notif notif)
        Marks all notifications prior to and including the specified notification as read.
        Parameters:
        notif - the notification that sets the upper bound on read notifications

      • createEncounterMsgingChannel

        void createEncounterMsgingChannel(java.lang.String encounterID)
        Creates a topic for communication with this particular encounter
        Parameters:
        encounterID - the String name for the encounter

      • sendBroadcastMsg

        void sendBroadcastMsg(java.lang.String msg,
                      IEncountersService.Filter filter)
        Sends a message to all encounters that meet the requirement specified by filter, and additionally indicates that those encounters should forward the message to any of their encounters that fit the filter. This forwarding continues within the bounds of the filter..
        Parameters:
        msg - a string representing the message to be sent
        filter - a filter to specify the time interval, location range, and/or link matches of encounters to which the message should be forwarded

      • sendBroadcastMsg

        void sendBroadcastMsg(java.lang.String msg,
                      IEncountersService.Filter filter,
                      int numHopsThreshold)
        Sends a message to all encounters that meet the requirement specified by filter, and additionally indicates that those encounters should forward the message to any of their encounters that fit the filter. This forwarding continues for the specified number of encounter hops.
        Parameters:
        msg - a string representing the message to be sent
        filter - a filter to specify the time interval, location range, and/or link matches of encounters to which the message should be forwarded
        numHopsThreshold - the limit of the number of hops this message should be sent

      • processMessageForBroadcasts

        void processMessageForBroadcasts(org.mpisws.sddrservice.embeddedsocial.ESTopics.Msg msg)
        Processes a message to see if it should be broadcasted
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to be processed
